text: Today:

heading: heading placeholder
text: Partly sunny with late morning showers and thunderstorms over Northern New York spreading west through midday.  Some stronger storms will provide gusty to possibly damaging winds, best chance of strong storms north of Rutland.  Hot and humid with highs in the mid 80s to lower 90s. South to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph.

text: Mostly cloudy with increasing sunshine later in the day. Areas of morning valley fog. A few lingering showers likely until midday, mainly south of Rutland. Not as hot with highs in upper 70s to mid 80s, warmest south. North winds 5 to 15 mph.
